ConversationMessageDefinition.label: How do I stake on Ndax - Mobile App

primitiveValues.formulaTemplate:
1. Open the Ndax app and log in. 2. Tap Wallet, then go to the Staking tab. 3. Select the asset you want to stake. 4. Tap Stake and accept the staking disclaimer. 5. Choose a plan and the amount to stake (or select 25%, 50%, 75%, or 100% of your balance). 6. Tap Continue. 7. Review the plan details and tap Start Staking.
Please note that there is a bonding period between 1-3 days. Once the bonding period is complete, your crypto will begin earning rewards!
